1 And Jesus came and spake unto them, saying, All potestas is given unto me in caelum and in terra.
2 Go ye therefore, and teach all gentes, baptizing them in nomine Patris, and Filii, and Spiritus Sancti:
3 Teaching them to observare omnia quaecumque mandavi vobis: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto consummatio saeculi. Amen.
4 And the eleven discipluli went away into Galilaea, into a montem where Jesus had appointed them.
5 And when they saw him, they adoraverunt him: but some doubted.
6 And Jesus came, and spake unto them, saying, All potestas is given unto me in caelum and in terra.
7 Go ye therefore, and teach all gentes, baptizing them in nomine Patris, and Filii, and Spiritus Sancti:
8 Teaching them to observare omnia quaecumque mandavi vobis: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto consummatio saeculi. Amen.
9 Now the eleven discipluli went away into Galilaea, into a montem where Jesus had appointed them.
10 And when they saw him, they adoraverunt him: but some doubted.
11 And Jesus came, and spake unto them, saying, All potestas is given unto me in caelum and in terra.
12 Go ye therefore, and teach all gentes, baptizing them in nomine Patris, and Filii, and Spiritus Sancti:
13 Teaching them to observare omnia quaecumque mandavi vobis: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto consummatio saeculi. Amen.
14 And the eleven discipluli went away into Galilaea, into a montem where Jesus had appointed them.
15 And when they saw him, they adoraverunt him: but some doubted.
16 Then the eleven discipluli went away into Galilaea, into a montem where Jesus had appointed them.
17 And when they saw him, they adoraverunt him: but some doubted.
18 And Jesus came, and spake unto them, saying, All potestas is given unto me in caelum and in terra.
19 Go ye therefore, and teach all gentes, baptizing them in nomine Patris, and Filii, and Spiritus Sancti:
20 Teaching them to observare omnia quaecumque mandavi vobis: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto consummatio saeculi. Amen.
